title: Newly Updated! Washer/Dryer Incl! Monitored Alarms!
posting_body: 1 and 2 bedroom apartments offer renovated interiors featuring granite countertops, black appliances, and wood-burning fireplaces.
Our pet friendly community is equipped with pet stations throughout to property, as well as great walking areas.

Featuring SMART home technology, which offers you even more security and convenience with Keyless Door Locks, Programmable Thermostats, Monitored Alarm Security, Water Leak Sensors, and integration with other SMART devices.
Escape from the hustle and bustle of the Metroplex and relax in charming Trophy Club, TX!
Our unbeatable location provides you with easy access to Interstate 114, 121, DFW and so much more.
We are also close to the best dining, shopping and entertainment options Trophy Club has to offer.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Realty
